summary: Feature request to expose workflow and activity instances through class methods for easier access from context. Workflows should be accessible via `Temporalio::Workflow.instance` and activities via `Temporalio::Activity::Context#instance`.
userImpact: Allows users to more easily access the current workflow or activity instance from within execution context without storing it manually.
proposedFix: Make workflow instance available as `Temporalio::Workflow.instance` class method and activity instance available as `Temporalio::Activity::Context#instance` instance method.
resolutionDetails: Feature was implemented to provide instance access through the specified methods.
keyQuote: The created instance of the workflow class should be made available as `Temporalio::Workflow.instance` class method.
